name: Delivery and Resource Management Mechanics
description: This category encompasses mechanics that involve delivering items or resources while managing various challenges and obstacles. Players must navigate environments, complete tasks within time constraints, and gather resources to succeed.

name: Resource Management and Simulation
description: This category encompasses mechanics that involve managing resources, populations, and interactions within a dynamic environment, often requiring strategic decision-making to achieve specific goals.

name: Action Strategy Mechanics
description: Mechanics that combine elements of strategic planning and real-time action, requiring players to make decisions that affect their long-term success while engaging in immediate gameplay challenges.
